mapper.sql: ot_sequence_no, ot_approve_no, ot_title, ot_approve_state, ot_approve_result, ot_approve_begin, ot_approve_end, ot_ask_staff_id, ot_ask_staff_name, ot_ask_staff_depart, ot_history_approve_name, ot_approve_record, ot_now_approve_name, ot_cost, ot_ask_begin_time, ot_ask_end_time, ot_legal_holiday, ot_pay_method, ot_ask_sustain, ot_ask_reason, ot_comment, ot_address
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from yo_overtime
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from yo_overtime
ot_ask_staff_name like CONCAT('%','${otAskStaffName}','%')
and ot_ask_staff_id ='${otAskStaffId}'
and ot_ask_staff_depart like CONCAT('%','${otAskStaffDepart}','%')
and ot_approve_result = '${otApproveResult}'
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) <= date(ot_ask_begin_time)
and DATE_FORMAT(ot_ask_begin_time,"%Y-%m-%d") >= '${otAskBeginTime}' and DATE_FORMAT(ot_ask_end_time,"%Y-%m-%d") <= '${otAskEndTime}'
mapper.insert: insert into yo_overtime (ot_sequence_no, ot_approve_no, ot_title, ot_approve_state, ot_approve_result, ot_approve_begin, ot_approve_end, ot_ask_staff_id, ot_ask_staff_name, ot_ask_staff_depart, ot_history_approve_name, ot_approve_record, ot_now_approve_name, ot_cost, ot_ask_begin_time, ot_ask_end_time, ot_legal_holiday, ot_pay_method, ot_ask_sustain, ot_ask_reason, ot_comment, ot_address) values (#{otSequenceNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{otApproveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otApproveState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otApproveResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otApproveBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otApproveEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAskStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAskStaffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otHistoryApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otApproveRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otNowApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAskBeginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAskEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otLegalHoliday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otPayMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAskSustain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAskReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update yo_overtime
ot_approve_no = #{otApproveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_title = #{otTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_approve_state = #{otApproveState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_approve_result = #{otApproveResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_approve_begin = #{otApproveBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_approve_end = #{otApproveEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ot_ask_staff_name = #{otAskStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_ask_staff_depart = #{otAskStaffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_history_approve_name = #{otHistoryApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_approve_record = #{otApproveRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_now_approve_name = #{otNowApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ot_ask_begin_time = #{otAskBeginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_ask_end_time = #{otAskEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_legal_holiday = #{otLegalHoliday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_pay_method = #{otPayMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_ask_sustain = #{otAskSustain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_ask_reason = #{otAskReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_comment = #{otComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ot_address = #{otAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ot_sequence_no = #{otSequenceNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yo_overtime set ot_approve_no = #{otApproveNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_title = #{otTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_approve_state = #{otApproveState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_approve_result = #{otApproveResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_approve_begin = #{otApproveBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_approve_end = #{otApproveEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_ask_staff_id = #{otAskStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_ask_staff_name = #{otAskStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_ask_staff_depart = #{otAskStaffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_history_approve_name = #{otHistoryApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_approve_record = #{otApproveRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_now_approve_name = #{otNowApproveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_cost = #{otCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_ask_begin_time = #{otAskBeginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_ask_end_time = #{otAskEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_legal_holiday = #{otLegalHoliday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_pay_method = #{otPayMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_ask_sustain = #{otAskSustain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_ask_reason = #{otAskReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_comment = #{otComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ot_address = #{otAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ot_sequence_no = #{otSequenceNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
